comments.author: xian_nicolae2004@yahoo.com
comments.creator: xian_nicolae2004@yahoo.com
comments.text:
Created attachment 576449
crash log

Mozilla/5.0 (Android;Linux armv7l;rv:11.0a1)Gecko/20111122
Firefox/11.0a1 Fennec/11.0a1
Devices: Samsung Galaxy Nexus S
OS: Android 2.3.4

Possible steps to reproduce:
1. Open Fennec App
2. Browse to 3-4 webpages, each one in a new tab
3. Switch tabs while at least 1-2 webpages are still loading

Expected result:
After step 3, no crash occurs.

Actual result:
The following crash occurred: https://crash-stats.mozilla.com/report/index/bp-5d1cd9fd-9c10-412e-ba60-ea9082111123

Please see the attached log file.
comments.raw_text:
Mozilla/5.0 (Android;Linux armv7l;rv:11.0a1)Gecko/20111122

Devices: Samsung Galaxy Nexus S
OS: Android 2.3.4

Possible steps to reproduce:
1. Open Fennec App
2. Browse to 3-4 webpages, each one in a new tab
3. Switch tabs while at least 1-2 webpages are still loading

Expected result:
After step 3, no crash occurs.

Actual result:
The following crash occurred: https://crash-stats.mozilla.com/report/index/bp-5d1cd9fd-9c10-412e-ba60-ea9082111123

Please see the attached log file.

I see one from birch and one from XUL.  I can't seem to reproduce this particular issue based on the STR.  Nicolae, can you try retesting please?

https://crash-stats.mozilla.com/query/query?product=Fennec&version=ALL%3AALL&range_value=30&range_unit=days&date=01%2F24%2F2012+16%3A57%3A42&query_search=signature&query_type=contains&query=mozilla%3A%3Adom%3A%3ALink%3A%3ALinkState&reason=&build_id=&process_type=any&hang_type=any&do_query=1

comments.text:
(In reply to Naoki Hirata :nhirata from comment #1)
> I see one from birch and one from XUL.  I can't seem to reproduce this
> particular issue based on the STR.  Nicolae, can you try retesting please?
> 
> https://crash-stats.mozilla.com/query/
> query?product=Fennec&version=ALL%3AALL&range_value=30&range_unit=days&date=01
> %2F24%2F2012+16%3A57%3A42&query_search=signature&query_type=contains&query=mo
> zilla%3A%3Adom%3A%3ALink%3A%3ALinkState&reason=&build_id=&process_type=any&ha
> ng_type=any&do_query=1

I'm not able to reproduce this crash anymore on the latest Nightly build. The Tabs Menu has changed meanwhile and I cannot switch so fast tabs, as I did when this menu was quite simple (it didn't covered screen as it does now).
comments.raw_text:
(In reply to Naoki Hirata :nhirata from comment #1)

> ng_type=any&do_query=1

I'm not able to reproduce this crash anymore on the latest Nightly build. The Tabs Menu has changed meanwhile and I cannot switch so fast tabs, as I did when this menu was quite simple (it didn't covered screen as it does now).

comments.text:
https://crash-stats.mozilla.com/query/query?product=FennecAndroid&version=ALL%3AALL&range_value=30&range_unit=days&date=02%2F09%2F2012+15%3A55%3A41&query_search=signature&query_type=contains&query=mozilla%3A%3Adom%3A%3ALink%3A%3ALinkState&reason=&build_id=&process_type=any&hang_type=any&do_query=1

Seems like a XUL bug, last crash happened with 10 in Jan. 18th
2 URLs to play with :
http://www.greenfieldguns.com/
http://www.google.com/m?q=g&ie=utf-8&oe=utf-8&aq=t&rls=org.mozilla:en-US:official 

Closing off as WFM; please reopen if there's a more recent crash with this signature.
